title.narrative: Emergency Response Project for Tonj North and South

description.narrative: This is an operational project to facilitate the implementation of CGF funded project which will Provide timely, safe, dignified, and accountable humanitarian assistance for communities in Tonj North and Tonj South. The area is affected by intercommunal conflicts causing displacements and as a result, hunger as communities are not stable to farm their land and produce their own food. In addition, the displacement has caused trauma and stress among women, children and elderly which was initially related to property left back, lack of food and poor sleeping and living conditions. The population displaced are deprived of their food, livestock, NFIs and their living conditions have deteriorated which counts to more than 18,000 internal displaced persons (IDPs) are temporarily hosted at Mayom biong Primary school, Church and some hosted by their relatives of Gogrial East County. The overall psychological wellbeing of IDPs and host communities is affected due to this calamities.
